metadata.title: CVE-2018-14353 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mutt before 1.10.1 and NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. imap_quote_string in imap/util.c has an integer underflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-14353` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.10.1-1
No subscription required

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.1-1').
neomutt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
